description: Luton Town: Ask your pre-season questions to BBC Sport
title: Luton Town: Ask your pre-season questions to BBC Sport
title_page: Luton Town: Ask your pre-season questions to BBC Sport - BBC Sport
maintext:
The 2023-24 Premier League season is edging ever nearer, so what shape are Luton in before the big kick-off on Saturday, 12 August?
Our BBC Three Counties Radio expert Geoff Doyle is on hand to give his thoughts on all things Town if you send in your questions.
